espresso.name: Espresso
espresso.description: Espresso is made with finely ground coffee and hot water, brewed under high pressure.
espresso.additional_info: It's strong, bitter, and very high in caffeine. It also serves as the base for many other drinks.

americano.name: Americano
americano.description: It smooths out the bitterness while keeping the caffeine level high.
americano.additional_info: It's a good pick when you want to stay alert for longer.

macchiato.name: Macchiato
macchiato.description: It's an espresso marked with a spoonful of milk foam.
macchiato.additional_info: Macchiato keeps the espresso's strength but adds a touch of creaminess without diluting the flavor.

latte.name: Caf√© Latte
latte.description: Let's mix espresso with plenty of steamed milk and foam.
latte.additional_info: This can be your go-to drink when you want something mild, warm, and smooth.

mocha.name: Mocha
mocha.description: It is a sweet mix of espresso, milk, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream.
mocha.additional_info: It's both a dessert and a drink. A great option when you want flavor and focus together.

dr_coffee.name: Dr. Coffee
dr_coffee.title: Dr. Coffee
dr_coffee.initial_message: Welcome! I'm Dr. Coffee, your caffeinated professor with a PhD in Espressology. Let me help you regain your energy!
